question: The Central Industrial Security Force (CISF) is set to observe 2020 as which year?
explanation:
The Central Industrial Security Force (CISF) recently announced that it will observe 2020 as the \'Year of mobility\'. It was also announced that special attention would be provided towards creation of more residential units and welfare measures for their troops. The announcement was made by the Director General of CISF, Rajesh Ranjan.
The Central Industrial Security Force (CISF) is a Central Armed Police force under the Ministry of Home affairs, headquartered at New Delhi.
